This investment is key to improving the business's assortment of products and, thus, increase the sales.

Her short-term goal is to double her sales and get the most out of the love and friendship season (the Colombian equivalent of St Valentine's Day, which is celebrated on the third Saturday of September). Her family goal is to buy her own apartment.

loans.use: to buy new products such as perfumes, lotions, colognes, body splashes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Trabajadoras se llama este grupo, están en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 10 de las integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en una pobreza extrema, donde cada una está luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que hace trabajos de crochet, y por medio de esto tiene los medios para poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de hilos, agujas bastidores, telas y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo, y luchando por poder crecer y mejorar. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
"Mujeres Trabajadoras" is the name of this group, which is in its third cycle of the Women's Communal Bank Program. They are completing the elimination of poverty survey, where ten of the members are below the poverty line, that is, in extreme poverty, and each is fighting to be able to improve her living conditions.

One of the members, Señora María, is improving her situation of poverty, but she is also aware that this work and the effort that she is making must be continuous and permanent. Among the work that she does is making crocheted items, and through this she has the means to be able to give her family everything that she couldn't have.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of thread, needles, frames, fabric, and other items. In this way, she can continue with her work as she has been doing, and fighting to be able to grow and improve. She appreciates the opportunity that she is receiving to grow her enterprise.

loans.use: to purchase thread, needles, frames, fabric, and other items.

loans.name: Francisca Maria

texts.es: Francisca de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella trabaja como empleada domestica desde hace varios años, con lo que gana de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere seguir mejorando su vivienda, por esa razón solicita nuevamente un crédito para colocar el techo por esa razón solicita dicho crédito y comprar laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que ella su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Francisca is 59 years old and lives in her own house with her husband.  She has worked as a housekeeper for several years, from what she earns in this job and with the help of her husband they manage to cover their household costs.  

She would like to make improvements to her home, for this reason she is requesting a loan to buy a new roof, for which she will need to buy metal sheeting, poles and to pay for labour, so that she and her family can live more securely.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, poles and pay for labour costs.

loans.name: Jovie Marie

texts.en:
Jovie Marie is 22 years old and has two children.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Jovie Marie requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jovie Marie has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

In the future, Jovie Marie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn works hard to support her family. Analyn is married and has a business buying and selling recycled materials in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell.

Analyn has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, Analyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business of buying and selling rice grains in the Philippines.

She is borrowing 25,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell in her rice grains business. Luzviminda has been in this business for 5 years. She earns more income from pig fattening.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 52 years old and married and has four children, two of whom are in school. Marilyn works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, eggs, noodles, shampoo, chips, etc.

Marilyn has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, egg, noodles, shampoo, chips, etc.

loans.name: Glorie

texts.en:
Glorie works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

Glorie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. for her general store business. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Glorie has been sustaining her business activities through her six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Shirly

texts.en:
Shirly is 44 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy addittional stock to sell, like canned goods, shampoo, etc. Shirly has been in this business for six years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy addittional stock to sell, like canned goods, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Ilsia Maria

texts.es:
Ilsia, de 23 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa para dama, caballero y niño.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus dos hijos, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de ropa al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Ilsia is 23 years old. She is very clear about what she wants for her life and she is determined to complete her education in order to support herself and have a good life.

Ilsia would like to work as a saleswoman of various merchandise like women's, men's, and children's clothing. She would like to start this activity with the desire to seek the resources necessary to sustain her two children, as well as to be able to contribute to the household expenses.

Ilsia is an enterprising and very disciplined woman. She is requesting a loan to purchase a wide variety of clothing at wholesale in order to take advantage of the opportunity to be independent that the Interactuar Corporation is presenting to her.

She has hopes of being able to progress as a businesswoman and of having a more stable income. She thanks all the people who are able to contribute to her dream.

loans.use: to buy a wide assortment of clothing at wholesale in order to take advantage of the opportunity that the Interactuar Corporation is presenting to her.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Hog raising has been the life of Letecia. She has been in this business for almost 20 years, and it has supported the needs of her family.

Letecia signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC to expand her business ventures. She successfully repaid her previous loan with the cooperative and has now received her 11th loan. The amount of 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) will be used to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.name: Mat-An

texts.en:
Mat-an has a banana farm in Cantabon, Siquijor. This is her primary source of income for her family.

Mat-an makes it a point to maintain good land preparation to have maximum yield, so as to have good income. Recently, she needed funds to pay for irrigation costs, which she borrowed from Paglaum MPC.

Mat-an wants to sustain her business, and to be able to supply bananas to the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for labor for irrigation to soften the tillage pans.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta landed in the right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. Jacinta knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet when she went broke after her first business failed. PMPC rescued her by lending money when she needed it the most.

Jacinta has requested another loan for the next cropping season for land and seedbed preparation. She perseveres and always believes in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is a 25-year-old single woman from Pari-an, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor.

She engages in a poultry business that gives her a monthly income of approximately PHP 3,500.

She wants to add more laying chicks to augment her chicken egg production that she started thanks to a loan from Paglaum MPC.

The amount shall be used to buy additional laying chicks for her poultry business.

loans.use: to buy additional laying chicks for her poultry business.

loans.name: Adolfo Gustavo

texts.es: Adolfo es un microempresario con una amplia experiencia en reparación y mantenimiento de aparatos eléctricos; desde joven sintió gran interés en sistemas eléctricos por lo que decidió tomar capacitación para así poder dedicarse a esta profesión.  En el sector donde reside ubicado en el municipio de Malambo es muy recomendado por su eficiente labor, sus vecinos, conocidos y amigos son su principales clientes a quienes repara sus electrodomésticos; planchas, abanicos, televisores, neveras, equipos de sonido entre otros.  Todos los días de la semana está dispuesto a realizar sus trabajos a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m. y con la finalidad de contar con los repuestos y accesorios necesarios para el óptimo desempeño de su trabajo está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar cables, tornillos y componentes.  Su meta a futuro es mejorar la imagen del negocio para atraer a nuevos clientes.  Su meta familiar es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Adolfo is a microentrepreneur with lots of experience repairing and maintaining electrical goods; since he was young he has taken great interest in electronics and so he decided to train in this profession in order to be able to make a living from it.  In the area where he lives in the town of Malambo, he has a good reputation for his efficient work, his neighbours, acquaintances and friends are his main customers whose appliances he repairs – he repairs irons, fans, televisions, refrigerators and sound systems, among other things.  He is available to work every day of the week from 8am until 8pm.
  
In order to have replacement parts and the right accessories to work most effectively, he is applying for his first credikiva through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy cables, screws and other components.  His aim for the future is to improve the image of his business to attract new customers.  His aim for his family is to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: comprar cables, tornillos y componentes

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, milk, noodles, etc. She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, like farming vegetables.

Milagros dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, milk, noodles, etc

loans.name: Daisy Suyapa

texts.es: Daisy, tiene 39 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien ha tenido 3 hijos y reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio del Progreso, Yoro acompañada con dos hijas. Desde pequeña se ha dedicado al comercio, anteriormente vendía carnes y verduras. Hace 8 años que vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, sandalias, lociones, cremas y cosméticos. Daisy vende de manera ambulante y por pedidos de sus clientes. Ha solicitado un prestamo por 10,000 lempiras para emprender otra actividad que es la elaboración de almohadas, por lo cual va comprar telas, foam (esponja) para elaborar almohadas, comprará ropa íntima y sandalias para vender. Considera que esta inversión le ayudará a crecer en el negocio y poder seguir implementando otras actividades que le generen ingresos para terminar de darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Daisy is 39 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she has three children.  She lives in a small village in the town of Progreso, Yoro accompanied by two daughters.  Since she was small, she has been working in business; she previously sold meat and vegetables.  For 8 years she has been selling clothes for men, women and children, sandals, lotions, creams and cosmetics.  She sells her products on the street and also takes orders from customers.  

She has requested a loan for 10,000 lempiras to start a new venture making pillows.  To do this, she is going to buy fabric and padding to make the pillows, she will also buy underwear and sandals to sell.  She believes this investment will help her to grow the business and will allow her to continue to add other products to her business, which will generate income to finish supporting her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fabric and padding to make pillows, and also underwear and sandals to sell.

loans.name: Jose De La Paz

texts.es:
José, de 47 años de edad, está acompañado, su suegro les regaló un parte de terreno para que pudieran construir su casa y comenzar a formar su familia.  

José, desde que tenía 12 años de edad, su padre lo llevaba la sierra a trabajar, para poder ganarse la vida de forma honrada, esto marcó la vida de José y le mostró el camino que debía seguir y dedicarse a la agricultura. 

El dinero del préstamo será para comprar insumos agrícolas para aplicarlos a la milpa de esta temporada, porque tiene que cosechar para el sustento de la familia.
texts.en:
José, aged 47, is married. His father-in-law gave him and his wife a piece of land where they could build their house and start a family.

At the age of 12, and in order to earn a living in an honest way, he began accompanying his father to work in the mountains. This experience marked José's life and showed him the path he should follow, so he decided to engage in agriculture.

He will use the loan to buy agricultural inputs for this season's crops because he needs a good harvest to be able to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for this season's crops.

loans.name: Loredel

texts.en:
Loredel is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a services (manicure and pedicure) business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy a manicure set and other tools for nail cleaning for her services (manicure and pedicure) business.

Loredel has been in this business for 20 years. Loredel earns additional income from pig fattening.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy a manicure set and other tools for nail cleaning.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда милая и простая женщина из города Курган-Тюбе. Ей 37 лет. Мавлуда замужем и мать троих детей. Её муж, как и другие жители, уехал на заработки в Россию. Сама Мавлуда занимается куплей и продажей детской одежды. Она просит кредит для лечение своей дочери, которая очень больна. Мавлуда должна увезти её в другую страну на лечение. У них есть свои средства, однако этого недостаточно. Мавлуда полагается на Вашу доброту и поддержку. Она надеется, что её дочке восстановят здоровье. Ведь здоровье ребенка это счастье родителей.
texts.en: Mavluda is a kind and humble woman from the city Qurgan-Tube. She is 37 years old. Mavluda is married and the mother of three children. Her husband, like many people in the region, went to Russia for work. Mavluda buys and sells children's clothing. She has applied for a loan for medical treatment for her daughter, who is very sick. Mavluda must take her to another country for treatment. Their means alone are not enough. Mavluda is relying on your kindness and support. She hopes that her daughter will recover. As we say in Russian, "the child's health is the parents' happiness."

loans.use: get medical treatment for her daughter

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 32 years old and married with five children.

Mary Jane earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs. Mary Jane has been raising pigs for 3 years and also earns additional income from farming vegetables.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en:
Leonarda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Leonarda requested a loan of 29,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more variety of fish to sell in her fish stall. She has been in this business for 12 years now.

Leonarda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more variety of fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Russel

texts.en:
Russel is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 29 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Russel has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase ingredients like cooking oil, flour, and sugar for her food production business.

Russel has been in this business for 8 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like cooking oil, flour, and sugar for her food production business.

loans.name: Hajia

texts.en:
Hajia lives at Nima a in Accra. She is 67 years of age and has children between ages 20 and 40 years old. She is a trader and a landlady. She has no toilet facility in her house. She consulted her tenants about the need for them to have a toilet facility and they all agreed.

Hajia will use this loan to build a household latrine for her family and her tenants. She will repay the loan from the contributions she receives from her tenants.

loans.use: to build household latrine in her house.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 44 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Liza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional items like candies, canned goods, snack foods, noodles, beers, and coffee to sell.

Liza has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items such as candies, canned goods, snack foods, noodles, beers, and coffee. Liza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like candies, canned goods, snack foods, noodles, beers, and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Discapacitados En Accion Group

texts.es: La Sra. Marina tiene 63 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos dependientes. Es la presidenta de la alcancía comunal “Discapacitados en acción”, grupo que viene trabajando por más de 5 años de manera responsable y ahora está conformada por 5 personas que tienen todo el entusiasmo de cumplir con sus objetivos planteados. Marina tiene como negocio la venta de picarones, cachangas y café que ella misma prepara para sus clientes todos los días, es por ello que el préstamo lo invertirá en su negocio como comprar mesas y sillas donde pueda atender a su clientela. Una de las metas que tiene es ver que su hija sea profesional y que su negocio siga creciendo. En la foto grupal Marina se encuentra de pie en medio de las demás personas sentadas.
texts.en:
Marina is 63 years old, is married and has two dependent children. She is the president of the communal bank Discapacitados en acción” [Disabled in Action], a group that has been working for more than five years in a responsible manner and is now made up of five people who are very enthusiastic to meet their objectives.

Marina has a business selling picarones [type of Peruvian doughnut], cachangas [type of fried pastry] and coffee that she prepares for her customers every day.

The loan will be invested in her business for purchasing tables and chairs where she can serve her customers.

One of her goals is to see her daughter as a professional and keep her business growing.

In the group photo Marina is standing in the middle of the other seated people.

loans.use: To purchase tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Hikoyat

texts.ru: Хикояту 44 года. По натуре она добрая и мягкая женщина, но сильна духом. Хикоят вместе с мужем и детьми живет на районе Шахритус. Хикоят работает в сфере земледелием. Она уже 3 года в этой сфере деятельности. Хокоят посадила урожай и теперь ей нужно обработать урожай минеральными удобрениями. Ее средств не хватает, чтобы самостоятельно совершить покупку, и она обращается к KIVA за поддержкой. Она верит, что скоро она купить минеральные удобрения, обработает урожай и будет ждать сбора урожая.
texts.en: Hikoyat is 44 years old. She is a kind and gentle woman but strong in spirit. Hikoyat lives with her husband and children in the Shahrituz region. She works in the agricultural sector. She has been working in agriculture for three years. Hikoyat has planted her crops and now needs to fertilize them. She doesn't have enough funds to purchase fertilizer, and has turned to Kiva for support. She thinks she will purchase the fertilizer soon, cultivate her crops, and wait for the harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn is 51 years old and married with three children.

Merilyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs. Merilyn has been raising pigs for 6 years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Merilyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Khursand

texts.ru: Такую сильную, веселую женщину редко встречаешь. Хурсанд является одна из них. Она до сегодняшнего дня продвигает свою любимую работу. Хурсанд планирует продвигать свою профессию еще на много лет. Это деятельность ей как воздух, и без нее Хурсанд не может дышать. Хурсанд хочет расширить бизнес. Она решила приобрести больше ткани, многофункциональную швейную машинку и другие швейные принадлежности. Для завершения данной операции у нее нет денег, и Хурсанд решила обратиться за кредитом. Ваша помощь очень нужно Хурсанду.
texts.en: It is rare to meet such a strong, cheerful woman as Khursand. Even today, she is still pursuing her favorite work. She plans to continue working in her profession for many years. This work is like air to her - without it she couldn't breathe. Khursand wants to expand her business. She has decided to purchase more fabric, a multi-functional sewing machine and other sewing materials. She doesn't have the funds to do this, so she decided to apply for a loan. Khursand needs your help.

loans.use: to purchase sewing materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay career fees.

loans.name: Cristina Lucero

texts.es:
Cristina tiene 58 años de edad, soltera , sin hijos a su cargo , vive en casa familiar; en el distrito de Oyotun la cual es una zona rural, que pertence a la provincia de Chiclayo, region lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Cristina se dedica a la venta de yuca por kilos; hace 06 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en la puerta del mercado de abasto de oyotun, solicita préstamo para invertir en capital de trabjo; compra de yuca, sandia,camotes, papa, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio y dar un buen servicio a sus clientes, aumntar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cristina is 58 years old, single, and has no children in her care. She lives in her family home in the Oyotún district, a rural area that is part of the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region of Peru's northern coast.

Cristina has worked selling cassava by the kilo for six years. Her business is located outside the Oyotún supply market. She is requesting a loan to invest in working capital and to buy cassava, watermelons, sweet potatoes, and potatoes, with the objective of increasing her business, giving her customers good service, and increasing her income level to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and to buy cassava, watermelons, sweet potatoes, and potatoes

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina is 55 years old and married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Carolina has a tailoring business in the Philippines. Carolina requested a loan of 21,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Carolina has been in this business for 21 years. In the future, Carolina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business.

loans.name: Efrenia

texts.en:
Efrenia is 46 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Efrenia has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 13,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Efrenia has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es: Edith tiene 38 años, es casada y tiene dos hijos pequeños, ella vive en el Estado de México. Desde hace más de 6 años ella tuvo la oportunidad de comprar diversos equipos de cómputo a una escuela que quebró y decidió poner un internet con esos equipos, ella ofrece servicios, como: internet impresiones, copias, escaneo, líneas de captura, reparación de equipos de cómputo, entre otro. Ella tiene pensado a largo plazo poder ampliarlo e ingresar artículos de papelería y regalos. Ella comenta que sus hijos son su mayor motivación y por eso quiere ampliar su negocio, se define como emprendedora porque a pesar de las dificultades que ha tenido siempre ha salido adelante. Con un préstamo de MXN 10,000 ella podrá iniciar su proyecto de ampliar su negocio, comprara artículos de papelería. Ella está muy feliz por iniciar este proyecto y agradece a todas las personas que la van a ayudar.
texts.en:
Edith is 38 years old, married and has two young children. She lives in the state of Mexico. Over 6 years ago she had the opportunity to buy a variety of computer equipment from a school that went bankrupt and she decided to set up an internet cafe with the equipment. She offers services such as: internet access, printing, copies, scanning, access codes, and computer equipment repair, amongst others. 

In the long term she's thinking of expanding and adding stationery and gifts. She says that her kids are her biggest motivation and that's why she wants to expand her business. She sees herself as enterprising because in spite of the obstacles that she's faced she has always pulled through. With a loan of 10,000 MXN she'll be able to begin her plans to expand her business, and will purchase stationery. 

She's very happy about starting up this plan and thanks everybody that's going to help her.

loans.use: to buy stationary supplies.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado MUJERES TRABAJADORAS está en su ciclo 3º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde desarrollan el trabajo en equipo y la ayuda solidaria. Todas ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde cada una está luchando para poder superar su situación de pobreza.
 La Sra. Benjamina, quien a través del esfuerzo, el trabajo duro, las ganas de superación, el compromiso y la responsabilidad demostrada por ella, se va formando como una líder dentro de su comunidad siendo un ejemplo para las demás. Ella es cantinera, y pide este préstamo para poder comprar comestibles, bebidas, golosinas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The group called "Mujeres Trabajadoras" is in its third cycle of the Women's Communal Bank Program, where they are developing teamwork and helping each other in the spirit of solidarity. They are all in the Elimination of Poverty Program, in which each is fighting to be able to overcome her poverty.

Señora Benjamina, by her effort, hard work, desire to overcome, commitment, and the responsibility that she has demonstrated, is becoming a leader within her community, and an example for others. She owns a cantina and she is requesting this loan to purchase food, beverages, snacks, and other items, so that she will be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing.

She appreciates the opportunity that she is receiving, to be able to grow and improve every day.

loans.use: to purchase food, beverages, snacks, and other items, in order to stock her cantina.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es una joven estudiante proveniente de una familia del interior, hace más de 10 años que tuvo que salir de su ciudad para poder ir en busca de algo mejor.
Alicia es una persona muy sacrificada que está luchando por poder crecer y salir adelante. Está estudiando la licenciatura.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Alicia is a young student who comes from a family from the interior [of the country.] More than 10 years ago she had to leave her city to be able to go in search of something better.

Alicia is a very sacrificial person who is fighting to be able to grow and succeed. She is studying for her bachelor's degree.

She asks for this loan to be able to pay the fees of her degree. In this way she will be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores, de 65 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador y luchador, con mucho trabajo ha logrado salir adelante y crecer a sus 8 hijos, de los cuales 7 ya tiene sus propias familias y solo su último hijo vive con él en la casa, la agricultura ha sido su fuente principal de ingresos, pero además se dedica a la crianza y destazo de cerdos, con lo cual ha llevado el sustento a su familia durante varios años.

Dolores, ha trabajado la tierra desde los 11 años de edad junto a su padre, quien lo inspiró para mejorar y hacer de él un hombre de bien; gracias al empeño que el mostró y la audaz decisión de lucha, su padre le confiaba trabajar de manera particular en donde le daban tareas para el día, que puntualmente las cumplía con entusiasmo y coraje, bajo el sol y la lluvia.   

El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para comprar insumos agrícolas y comprar cerdos para la crianza y destazo, de esta manera continuará la ardua labor del campo y podrá seguir destazando.

Dolores, sueña con trabajar muy duro para comprometerse más con el desarrollo y el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Dolores is 65 years old and is a very hardworking and dedicated man. With a lot of work he has been able to get ahead and raise his eight children, of whom seven already have their own families; only his youngest son lives at home with him. Agriculture has been his primary source of income, but he also makes a living raising and butchering pigs. With this work he has supported his family for many years.

Since he was eleven years old, Dolores has worked the land alongside his father, who inspired him to improve and make a good man of himself. Thanks to the effort he showed and the audacious decision to strive, his father entrusted him with daily tasks in particular, which he promptly completed with enthusiasm and courage, under the run and the rain.  

The money from the loan will be used to buy agricultural supplies and to buy pigs to raise and butcher. In this way he will continue his arduous work in the fields and will be able to keep butchering.

Dolores dreams of working very hard to commit himself more to his family's development and well-being.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to buy pigs to raise and butcher

loans.name: Shofiya

texts.ru: Шофия уроженка Шахритуского района. Ей 34 года. Шофия общительная и жизнерадостная женщина. Она занимается куплей и продажей одежды. Её бизнес является основным источником дохода ее семьи. Дети Шофии учатся в средней школе, и она старается, чтобы они получили хорошее образование. Она всегда покупает им все необходимые вещи. В данный момент у Шофии нет достаточно средств на приобретение  новых бредовых одежд для продажи. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. Этот кредит очень важен для нее, так как без этого кредита она не сможет купить товар и продолжить свой бизнес. Пожалуйста, помогите Шофии не потерять источник ее дохода.
texts.en:
Shofiya is a native of the Shahrituz region. Shofiya is 34 years old, and she is a gregarious and joyful woman. Shofiya works by buying and selling clothing, and her business is the primary source of income for her family. Shofiya's children are in secondary school, and she is trying to make sure they get a good education. She always buys them the things they need.

Currently, Shofiya doesn't have enough funds to purchase new name-brand clothing to sell. Therefore, she has applied for a loan. The loan is very important for her, because without it she will not be able to buy goods and continue her business. Please, help Shofiya to not lose this source of income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Eduardo

texts.es: Don Oscar, tiene 39 años de edad, está casado, vive en un sector de Naco Cortes, cerca a Cofradía junto a su esposa y un hijo. Anteriormente realizaba trabajos de pegar cerámica. Y hace 8 años ha mantenido su negocio propio como su fuente de ingresos donde vende jugos naturales de frutas como naranja, mora y caña. Esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante, tiene un puesto en la entrada a la aldea a orilla de calle. El prestamo que ha solicitado es el quinto ciclo y es por 10,000 Lempiras para la compra de caña al por mayor, también en la compra de materiales como azúcar, agua, bolsas, frutas para la elaboración de jugos y reparación del equipo de sacar jugos. Considera que el préstamo le ayudara a vender más jugos porque tendrá materia prima suficiente para la elaboración. Su objetivo es construir un local pequeño en otro punto de Cofradía para vender jugos.
texts.en:
Oscar, is 39 years old, is married, lives in the sector of Naco Cortes, near Cofradía, with his wife and son.

Previously, he worked as a mason laying tiles. For about eight years now he has been working on his own business by selling natural fruit juices such as orange, blackberry and cane, which provides a source of income.

This activity is performed on a peddling basis. He has a stall at the entrance to the village on the edge of the street.

The loan requested is in its fifth cycle and it is for 10,000 lempiras to purchase sugar cane wholesale. Also, for the purchase of materials such as sugar, water, bags, fruit for making juice and to repair equipment that extracts juices.

He believes that the loan will help him sell more because he will have enough juice for raw material processing.

His goal is to build a small locale in another part of Cofradía where he can sell these juices.

loans.use: to purchase sugar cane wholesale.  Also, for the purchase of materials such as sugar, water, bags, fruit for making juice and to repair equipment that extracts juices.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 59 years old and married with two children. With one child still in school, Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more stock of products like canned goods, coffee, sugar, shampoo, and detergent soap to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, coffee, sugar, shampoo, and detergent soap. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of products like canned goods, coffee, sugar, shampoo, and detergent soap to sell.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, es una persona que se esta esforzando para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, y para la compra de unos libros. Su meta es poder culminar sus estudios y llegar a la meta de ser un Profesional y poder servir a su familia.
texts.en:
Sergio is studying Agricultural Engineering. He is from the city of Curuguaty. He is a person who is striving to become somebody in life.

He is requesting this loan to pay his university fees and to buy some textbooks.

His goal is to complete his studies and reach the goal of becoming a professional and with that be able to help his family out.

loans.use: to pay university fees and to purchase textbooks.

loans.name: Koe Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Unidas está en su ciclo número 3er del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Villa Ygatimí, cada una está luchando y esforzándose por mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias.
La Sra. Clara es una de las integrantes, ella tiene una pequeña, pero bien surtida despensa, comenta que con sacrificio está mejorándola y con su pequeño negocio mantiene a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con frutas, verduras, panificados, lácteos, y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con su negocio, y continuar ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The group named “Mujeres Unidas” (“United Women”) is on its third loan cycle. It is based in the city of Villa Ygatimí. Each member is striving to improve the living conditions of their families.

Clara is one of the members. She has a small but well-stocked store. She says that, with sacrifice, she is improving it and that her small business helps her to support her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan so she can stock her business with fruit, vegetables, bread products, dairy products, and other items so she can continue with her business and continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, bread products, dairy products, and other items to restock their business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To set up and expand the corrals where he shelters his goats.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is a 30 year old married woman, with three children. Her husband represents the main income source for the family in order to fulfil their family needs and being always ready to meet always their demands. Today, so as to pay her children's study fees, she is applying for a new loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. She said that she is very happy and satisfied as she is able to help them and ensure them a suitable educational path.

loans.use: to pay her children's study fees.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma is 61 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by having a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Guillerma is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Guillerma has been in pig-fattening for four years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jennefer

texts.en:
Jennefer is 34 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Jennefer has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional items such as candies, biscuits, sanitary pads, toothpaste, canned goods, etc. to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Jennefer has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items such as candies, biscuits, sanitary pads, toothpaste, canned goods, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Colette

texts.fr: Mère de sept enfants, Colette est une femme mariée qui vit à Agoè. Agée de 43 ans, Colette est une revendeuse de bouteilles et de bidons vide qui s’approvisionne et le revend quatre fois par mois au marché. Colette sollicite ce prêt pour commander des séries de bouteilles et de bidons vides en vue de gagner une marge bénéficiaire et pouvoir aider son mari à payer les frais scolaire des enfants dès la rentrée prochaine.
texts.en: The mother of seven, Colette is married and living in Agoè. She is 43 years old and a retailer of empty bottles and cans, and she gets her supplies four times a month at the market, where she also sells her merchandise. Colette is requesting this loan to order a few sets of empty bottles and cans with the aim of earning a profit margin and being able to help out her husband in covering the children’s schooling costs as soon as the school year begins.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sets of empty bottles and 2 sets of empty cans

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
While designing clothing as a hobby, Judy sold cars for 25 years. About 10 years ago, she decided to quit the car business and focus on her clothing designs full time.

Judy designs and manufactures women’s clothing, which is for sale online. She has the fabric custom-made for her in order to ensure high-quality products, which she then purchases in bulk. Judy hand designs and sews all her clothing herself.

She creates items that women love to wear and feel comfortable in. These are attractive and classy designs, which are timeless. She designs both basic and more extravagant clothing for all types of activities, including exercise.

Judy has been steadily growing her business over the last 10 years, and is continuing to do so through online advertisements. She will use the Kiva loan to purchase fabric to be used for production of clothes, in preparation for the busy holiday season.

loans.use: to purchase fabric to be used for production of clothes, in preparation for the Christmas season.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Badakoshi Village. John joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, John will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilisers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona's support, John now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his additional earnings to build a better home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields.

loans.name: Santa Luisa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Luisa está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Curuguaty, es una zona alejada de la zona céntrica, que aun esta en crecimiento y con poco acceso a muchos servicios.
La Sra. Valeriana es una de las integrantes, ella tiene su pequeño trabajo de elaboración y ventas de productos de limpieza ella trabaja en este  plan de negocios, y por medio de este trabajo se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Es una mujer muy sacrificada que lucha por su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para hacer sus productos de limpieza, y de esa manera poder seguir con su trabajo, luchando por poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
The group “Santa Luisa” is on its sixth loan cycle. It is based in the town of Curuguaty, which is cut off from the central area; it is still growing and there is little access to many services.

Valeriana is one of the members. She has a small business making and selling cleaning products. She is working on this business plan and through her work she is earning an honest living. She is a very self-sacrificing woman who fights for her family.

She is requesting this loan in order to buy supplies for making her cleaning products so she can continue with her work and continue striving to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making cleaning products

loans.name: Mercidita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Mercidita works hard to support her family.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling livestock. Mercidita is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials such as fabric, thread, needles, etc. for her tailoring business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Mercidita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials such as fabric, thread, needles, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is a young family man who has worked since he was little as a farmer in a share-land called El Encanto. He has lived in El Encanto since he was born. El Encanto is located in the Mexican state of Campeche, which has a high poverty rate.

Marcos has two children, and he has always encouraged them to study and become better persons and achieve better opportunities than he did. For many years, Marcos' family used candles to light their house. Now they have a solar system to generate electricity, but it is not enough to cover their needs.

Marcos wants to purchase a new solar system to increase the power generated; with this, to be able to turn on the light for more hours at night and to connect a radio to listen to the news and know what is happening outside of the share-land.

loans.use: to purchase a solar system to increase the power generated by his already-installed system to be able to connect a radio and listen to news.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto  de 38 años es residente del municipio de Puerto Colombia una localidad que alberga varias de las más importantes universidades y colegios del área metropolitana de Barranquilla, lugar donde logró consolidarse como microempresario al ofrecer el servicio de almuerzos, bebidas y refrescos a los estudiantes de la Universidad del Atlántico.  Su proyecto de negocio inició por recomendación de un amigo y de inmediato acogió la idea. De lunes a viernes llega hasta las instalaciones de la universidad y entrega los almuerzos los cuales son cancelados inmediatamente, sin embargo ofrece facilidad de pago a sus clientes fieles.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en víveres; arroz, aceite, carne, pollo, frutas.  Esta inversión es muy significativa para sus ganancias puesto que por compras al por mayor obtendrá descuentos.  Su meta a futuro es ampliar su cobertura y sus ventas para el próximo año.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is a 38-year old resident of the town of Puerto Colombia, a town that is home to several major universities and colleges in the metropolitan area of ​​Barranquilla. Here he has managed to establish himself as a microentrepreneur. He offers lunch services and soft drinks to students of the Universidad del Atlántico [Atlantic University].

His business project started on the recommendation of a friend, and he immediately welcomed the idea.

From Monday through Friday he arrives at the university facilities and delivers lunches which are paid for immediately. He also provides ease of payment to his loyal customers.

He is currently requesting his first credikiva through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in food supplies such as: rice, oil, beef, chicken, fruit.

This investment is significant for his profits since by purchasing in bulk he will get discounts.

His future goal is to expand his coverage and sales for next year.

loans.use: to invest on food supplies such as: rice, oil, beef, chicken, fruit.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr: Kossiwa est une femme mariée âgée de 55 ans qui habite à Agoè. Mère de sept enfants, Kossiwa est une marchande qui prépare des beignets. Kossiwa s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile pour gagner des revenus. Pour commander des sacs du haricot et le bidon d’huile, Kossiwa nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Kossiwa is a married woman, 55 years old, living in Agoè. The mother of seven, she is a merchant who makes beignets. She gets her supplies three time a month at the market and resells her products in front of her home in order to earn revenues. To order sacks of beans and containers of oil, Kossiwa needs these funds to finance her supplies and to realize a good profit margin, so as to meet family needs.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of  beans and a container of oil

loans.name: Mahmadsodiki

texts.ru: Махмадсодики из района Джоми. Ему всего 21 лет. Он не женат и не имеет детей. Махмадсодики живет вместе с отцом, матерю и братьями. Отец работает в магазине. Братья находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Сам Махмадсодики занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Он 8 лет занимается в этой сфере. Махмадсодики сажает помидоры и кукуруза. Он сейчас готовить почву к новому посеву урожай. Ему надо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями для посева урожай. К сожалению, у Махмадсодики нет сумма для приобретения необходимых средств. Он решила обратиться за кредитом. Махмадсодики заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Mahmadsodiki is from Jomi. He is only 21 years old. He is not married and has no children. Mahmadsodiki lives with his father, mother and brothers. His father works in a shop. His brothers are working in Russia. Mahmadsodiki farms. He has 8 years of experience. Mahmadsodiki plants tomatoes and corn. He is now preparing the ground for planting new crops. He needs to cultivate the land with fertilizer. Unfortunately, Mahmadsodiki doesn't have the money. He decided to apply for a loan. Mahmadsodiki expresses his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Santa Rosa está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Fidelina quien se dedica a la venta de ropas, ella comenta que aunque su trabajo es muy sacrificado, ella de todas formas se esfuerza para poder tener los medios para ayudar a sus seres queridos. Fidelina agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con su pequeño emprendimiento como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group named “Santa Rosa” is on its first loan cycle. It is a new group and all of the members work and help each other to get ahead in life. They are doing the poverty elimination survey and are striving to improve their living conditions as well as those of their loved ones.

One of the members is Fidelina, who makes a living by selling clothes. She says that although her work requires a lot of sacrifice, she puts all of her effort into being able to have the means to help her loved ones.

Fidelina is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to improve her living conditions and the living conditions of her loved ones. She is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy various garments to sell so she can continue with her small business venture.

loans.use: to buy various garments to sell

loans.name: Mirali

texts.ru: Мирали добропорядочный человек из Фархорского района. Ему 59 лет. Он отец троих детей. Мирали занимается сельским хозяйством на протяжении многих лет. Таким образом, он обеспечивал свою семью и вырастил детей. Увидев тяжелую работу отца, его сыновья уехали в Россию на заработки. Они начали помогать отцу. Мирали очень хочет начать новый бизнес в сфере животноводства. Он уже достроил загон для скота, но, к сожалению, у него не осталось средств на покупку животных. Он с большой надеждой обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита он хочет купить несколько голов телят и начать свой бизнес. Он очень просит Вас ему помочь.
texts.en: Mirali is an upstanding man from the Farkhor region. He is 59 years old and the father of three children. Mirali has worked in agriculture for many years. With farming he has provided for his family and raised his children. Having seen the difficult work of their father, Mirali's sons went to Russia for work. They began to help their father. Mirali wants to start a new business in animal husbandry. He already built an enclosure for the cattle, but unfortunately he did not have enough funds to purchase animals. He then applied for a loan. With this loan he wants to buy a few calves and start his business. He is asking for your help.

loans.use: to purchase several calves.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
19 son las integrantes de este grupo, ellas son mujeres luchadoras que quieren salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos. Cada una de ellas están poniendo su esfuerzo para poder mejorar en los emprendimientos que hacen.
La Sra. Teresa es una de las integrantes, ella tiene su pequeño trabajo de negocio de despensa ella trabaja en este  plan de negocios, y por medio de su trabajo ayudar a su familia a que no les falte nada. Teresa pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas, verduras, panificados, lácteos, carne y otros, lo que le ayudará a poder surtir su negocio y dar a sus clientes lo que le piden.
texts.en:
There are 19 members in this group. They are all women who struggle and who want to get ahead in order to be able to help their loved ones. Each one of them is putting great effort into improving the enterprises they are involved in.

Teresa is one of these members. She has her small business in a general store. Through this work she is able to help her family to want for nothing.

Teresa is requesting this loan to purchase fruits, vegetables, breads, dairy, beef and others, which will help to stock up her business and provide her customers with what they request.

loans.use: to purchase fruits, vegetables, bread, milk, beef and others to stock up.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is the mother of two boys. She has always worked hard to be able to give them better life opportunities than she had when she was a kid. Margarita lives in a share-land called El Encanto, which is located in the Mexican State of Campeche. For many years, this share-land had no access to electricity, so families used candles, wood, and diesel as a light source.

Now Margarita's family, as some other families living there, owns a basic solar energy system that supports two light bulbs. Margarita wants to purchase another solar system to increase the power generated.

By having more power, Margarita's family would be able to turn on the light bulbs for more hours, and they would have enough power to connect a radio to listen to music. Also, Margarita's children would have better light to do their homework and study extra hours, which Margarita believes is fundamental for achieving better opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase a solar energy system to have better light conditions and to be able to connect a radio to listen to news and music.

loans.name: Gentille

texts.fr: Gentille est une femme mariée qui vit à Agoè avec ses deux enfants à charge. Agée de 37 ans, Gentille est une femme dynamique et courageuse  qui vend des friperies en parcourant les quartiers environnant afin de disposer d’une bonne capacité financière. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Gentille s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et désire ce prêt pour commander des friperies  afin de financer son commerce et trouver un bon rendement pour subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens et celui de ses enfants.
texts.en: Gentille is a married woman living in Agoè with her two children she supports. She is 37 years old and a courageous and energetic woman who sells secondhand clothing by going about nearby neighborhoods, so as to have a good financial capacity. To achieve her goals, she gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Gentille would like this loan to order some secondhand clothing in order to finance her business and earn a nice return, thus to meet her day-to-day needs and those of her children.

loans.use: to purchase a set of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander es un joven estudiante, que vive junto a sus padres y 2 hermanos. Él está estudiando la carrera de Mecánica de Mantenimiento porque es una carrera que le interesa mucho, debido a que se encarga de hacer mantenimientos a grandes máquinas industriales. 

Sus padres lo apoyaban económicamente con sus pensiones, pero como tiene otro hermano que también está estudiando en la misma institución, ya no pueden solventar todos los gastos. Es por ello que recurre al apoyo de KIVA para no dejar de estudiar y cumplir sus sueños de ser un excelente profesional. De no obtener el apoyo de KIVA, quizá hubiese dejado de estudiar hasta poder reunir el dinero suficiente que le permita solventar sus propias pensiones.

Él sueña con trabajar en una gran empresa del rubro, seguir capacitándose y formar su propia empresa familiar que le permite obtener mayores ingresos para apoyar a su familia, y así se sientan muy orgullosos de sus logros.

Alexander quiere expresarles algunas palabras a los colaboradores de KIVA: "Quiero agradecerles por el gran apoyo para aquellos estudiantes que, como en mi caso, no podemos solventar nuestros estudios por falta de dinero. Muchísimas gracias KIVA, no los defraudaré
texts.en:
Alexander is a young student who lives with his parents and 2 siblings. He is studying mechanical maintenance because it is a field that interests him greatly, since he is in charge of performing maintenance on large industrial machines.

His parents support him financially with their pensions, but since he has another brother who is also studying in the same institution, they can no longer pay all his expenses. It is for this reason that he is turning to Kiva for support -- so that he doesn't have to leave his studies, and so that he can achieve his dream of being an excellent professional.

Without the support of Kiva, he might have abandoned his studies until he was able to get enough money to pay his own fees.

He dreams of working for a big company in this line of business, to continue his training, and to form his own family business that will allow him to make a greater income to support his family, thus making them feel very proud of his accomplishments.

Alexander wishes to say a few words to Kiva supporters: "I want to thank you for the support for those students who, like me, cannot fund our studies due to lack of money. Thank you very much Kiva, I won't let you down."

loans.use: to support his studies in Mechanical Maintenance.

loans.name: Santa Rita Group

texts.es:
El grupo está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una de ellas está poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes que se destaca por ser una mujer muy emprendedora y luchadora, es la Sra. María quien con el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa. Ella se dedica a hacer comidas todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día y después sale a vender de manera ambulante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que todas están ofreciendo.
texts.en:
This group is doing the poverty elimination survey. Each member is doing their utmost to improve their living conditions and the living conditions of their loved ones.

One of the members is Maria, who is known for being a very enterprising and determined woman. With continual work and good habits, she is becoming a successful woman. She earns a living by making and selling food. She works every day and she starts very early and then goes out to sell her food on the streets.

She is requesting this loan in order to buy food-making supplies, such as vegetables, meat, and seasoning, so she can continue with her work. She is grateful for the opportunity that you are all giving her.

loans.use: to buy food-making supplies, such as vegetables, meat, seasoning, etc.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
El grupo Virgen del Rosario está en su ciclo número 8 del programa de comité de mujeres, el grupo se formó en la ciudad de Caacupé, con 17 mujeres muy unidas y sacrificadas. Ellas han visto una gran esperanza en el programa para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
La señora  Cerafina, ayuda al Sostenimiento de su familia con la cría de cerdos para luego llevarlos a la venta, comenta que a través de su emprendimiento tiene los medios para poder dar a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones. Cerafina comenta que tuvo que pasar por muchas necesidades y lucha pata que sus seres queridos no tengan que pasar por lo mismo que ella.
Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para cerdos y también para la compra de cerdos para la cría. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras reciben de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The Virgen del Rosario group is in its 8th cycle of the women's committee program. The group formed in the city of Caacupe, with 17 women who are giving and very close. They have seen great hope in this program since they can now help their loved ones.

Cerafina helps support her family with the raising of pigs for re-sale. She says that through her entrepreneurship she now has the means to give her family a decent life without hardship.

Cerafina says she had to go through many hardships, and she keeps striving so that her loved ones will not have to go through what she did.

She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of feed for pigs and for the purchase of pigs for breeding.

She is thankful for the opportunity she and her colleagues have been given, to be able to grow and succeed.

loans.use: to purchase feed and pigs for breeding.

loans.name: Marhamat

texts.ru: Мархамат жительница не большого района под названием Шахритус. Она семейная женщина и мать четверых детей. Муж Мархамат занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Сама Мархамат дома занимается выращиванием скотин. Она каждый свой день проводит на скотном дворе. Ей нравится своя работа, все ее соседи занимаются сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Мархамат обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность. Она собирается купить пару голов скотин. Она верит в Вас и полагается на свою удачу.
texts.en: Marhamat lives in a small town called Shahrituz. She is a married woman and a mother of four. Her husband is a repairman and she raises livestock at home. She spends each day in the yard with the animals. She likes her work and all of her neighbors are also farmers. Marhamat requested a loan to expand her livestock business. She is going to buy a pair of cattle. She has faith in you and trusts in her luck.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of cows

loans.name: Temur

texts.en:
Temur is 25 years old and is from the village of Tskhentaro. He has a mother and father and 2 sisters. The family's income is from a small agribusiness. In particular they cultivate a plot of land and harvest nuts.

Apart from this, Temur's father works as a daily worker and earns a small income. They live under the poverty line, and they do not have enough income to tackle any of their financial difficulties.

Temur wants to make his agribusiness more profitable and start dairy farming. He has requested financial support to purchase a cow. His credit request was approved within the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo which enables the rural poor to start or re-start businesses.

Temur and his family members will start cow breeding and produce milk products that will be sold locally. The loan will be a great support to this motivated man and his family, and they will highly appreciate Kiva lenders' help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and start dairy farming.

loans.name: Gulnoz

texts.ru: Гулноз молодая девушка из района Кубадиён. Ей 31 год. Гулноз замужем и имеет двоих детей. Она умелая мастерица. Гулноз дома печет лепешки и продает на рынке. Ее день начинается с раннего утра. Лепешки должны быть уже на прилавке, так как каждый завтрак начинается со свежих и горячих лепешек. Гулноз обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить муки. Она решила увеличить объем товара. Гулноз планирует постепенно расширять свой бизнес.  И верит, что ей помогут и ее мечта постепенно будет осуществляться.
texts.en: Gulnoz is a young woman from the Qubadiyon region. She is 31 years old. Gulnoz is married and has two children. She is a skilled craftswoman. Gulnoz bakes lepyoshkas (traditional flatbreads) at home and sells them at the market. Her day begins very early in the morning. Lepyoshkas must be at the market stall early, since every breakfast begins with fresh, hot lepyoshkas. Gulnoz has applied for a loan to purchase flour. She decided to increase her production volume. Gulnoz plans to steadily expand her business. She believes that you will help her and her dreams will slowly become reality.

loans.use: to purchase flour and bake breads

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a solar energy system to increase productive hours by being able to light her store after the sunset.

loans.name: Audrey

texts.en:
Audrey, pictured above, is a young entrepreneur who is excited to grow her sales of BrightBox, One Degree Solar’s solar energy kit that powers lights, phones, and radios. She is 24 years old and lives with her family which includes 7 sisters.

Audrey has a degree in sales and marketing and is eager to apply this knowledge to sell BrightBox to as many end-users as possible. She seeks support from Kiva's lenders to make this happen.

Through a Kiva loan, Audrey will be able to purchase 100 solar kits, which will allow her to increase her inventory to serve more customers and scale the exposure of BrightBox to many communities. Customers will be able to collect BrightBox systems immediately and pay for them upfront or over several months. Since they are currently spending money on polluting, unsafe, and inefficient energy, most will save enough to recoup costs in 4 to 5 months and never worry about fuel or fire again.

Audrey's long-term goal is to continue to receive inventory from One Degree Solar and be a consistent re-seller of BrightBox. With your help, Audrey will help families eliminate energy expenses, improve safety, and allow their children to read into the night.

loans.use: To receive and sell 100 units of BrightBox to both rural and urban end-users in Kenya.

loans.name: San Jose Obrero Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Jose Obrero está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo, donde cada una está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder capacitarse y por medio de ello ayudar a sus familias.
La Sra. Ana es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a la cría de animales y también hace crochet para poder dar a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones. Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora que quiere ser alguien en la vida, es por eso que pone todo de si.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar balanceados para animales y también comprar hilos, agujas y otros para poder seguir con sus pequeños emprendimientos.
texts.en:
The "San Jose Obrero" team is in its first cycle of the "Women Committee" program. This is a new team, where everyone is putting in their best effort to train and thus help their families.

One of the team members is Mrs. Ana, she is engaged in animal husbandry and also makes crochet items so that she may be able to provide her family with a decent living without indigence. Ana is a very hardworking woman who wants to be somebody in life and hence she puts forth all her efforts.

She is asking for this loan to purchase animal feed, as well as yarn, needles and other items to maintain her small business.

loans.use: purchase animal feed, as well as yarn, needles and other items.

loans.name: Gerarda

texts.en: Gerarda is 50 years old and lives at Cangmalalag, Siquijor, Philippines. In order to earn a living, she takes in and raises pigs from her neighborhood.  The piglets' owners share in the profit upon the sale, to be divided 60/40 or 70/30, depending on their agreement.  With a desire to earn more, she decided to raise pigs on her own as well. Through Paglaum MPC, she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional feed. She really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, in addition to the income of her husband. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: To buy additional bags of feeds

loans.name: Stephen Son

texts.en:
Stephen Son is 30 years old from Canlambo, Siquijor. He personally sells the catch from their fishing boat in nearby municipalities. Since he became a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, he has remained in good standing for almost 3 years.

Stephen Son wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to 14,900 PHP for the purchase of new nets. As much as possible, they have to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize chances of a low or zero catch. He already has floaters to help guard their fish cages.

Stephen Son also wants to buy the fish catch of his neighbors so he can sell more fish at the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices. In the future, he dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from his daily sales.

loans.use: to purchase new nets.

loans.name: Sayyora

texts.ru: Женщину на фотографии зовут Сайёра. Ей 53 года. У Сайёры нет мужа, а ее дети взрослые и обзаведены семьями. Сайёра занимается продажей арбузов и дыни. Она одна занимается этим бизнесом. Сейчас самый сезон продажи этих ягод. Сайёра решила привести большой объем товара. Она собирается осуществить свой план за счет заемных средств и надеется, что в ее выборе ее поддержать. Вы сейчас можете поддержать Сайёру.
texts.en: The woman in the photograph is Sayyora. She is 53 years old. Sayyora does not have a husband, and her children are grown up and have families of their own. Sayyora sells melons and watermelons. She works alone. Now is the season for selling these fruits. Sayyora has decided to purchase a large amount of goods. She is getting ready to implement her plan via a loan and hopes that you will choose to support her. You can support Sayyora now.

loans.use: to purchase melons and watermelons.

loans.name: Henerita

texts.en:
Henerita landed at the right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. She lives in Poblacion, San Juan, Siquijor where she owns and cultivates her land for corn production.

Now she requested another loan for the next cropping season. She needed the loan for land and seedbed preparation.

Henerita perseveres and always believes in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. Lolita tried her luck at doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. She loaned another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help give her farming income a big boost. Lolita looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in a position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

loans.name: Brenda Suyapa

texts.es: Brenda, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. En busca de obtener ingresos para su hogar decidió hace un año tener su propio negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, vende piñas, melones, papayas, bananos, papas, ajos, repollo, tomate, etc. este pequeño negocio lo tiene enfrente de su casa y le genera ingresos para cubrir gastos de su hogar. Ha solicitado un prestamo por 5,000 Lempiras para comprar más verduras y frutas con el fin de mantener surtido y aumentar las ventas. Ella sueña con ver su negocio grande y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Brenda is 30 years old. She is in a common-law marriage. She has two children with her husband. They live in the municipality of Puerto Cortes. A year ago, in order to obtain some income for her household, she decided to start her own business selling fruit and vegetables. She sells pineapples, melons, papayas, bananas, potatoes, garlic, cabbages, tomatoes, etc. This small business is located in front of her house and it generates enough income to cover the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 5,000 HNL in order to buy more fruit and vegetables with the goal of keeping her business stocked and increasing her sales. She dreams of expanding her business and having greater earnings.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Virila

texts.es:
La Sra. Virila es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene un copetín donde todos los días trabaja desde muy temprano, comenta que por medio de su trabajo esta creciendo y tiene todo lo que necesita para su día a día, a través de su préstamo anterior pudo comprar insumos para su copetín, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder comprar nuevamente bebidas como gaseosa, cerveza, jugo, también para la compra de carne, jamón, queso, panificados, harina, mandioca los cuales necesita para realizar sándwich de carne, empanadas de harina, mandioca y jamón y queso,y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Señora Virila is a very hardworking person, who has a little snack shop where she works every day starting very early. She comments that through her work, she is growing and has everything that she needs day-to-day, and that her previous loan enabled her to purchase supplies for her snack shop, which was a great help to her.

She is requesting this new loan in order to make another purchase of beverages, such as soda, beer, and juice. She will also purchase meat, ham, cheese, baked goods, flour, and yucca, which she needs to make meat sandwiches, and flour empanadas with yucca, ham, and cheese. In this way, she will be able to continue with her work.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, such as soda, beer and juice; and to purchase meat, ham, cheese, baked goods, flour, and yucca.

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.ru: Бунафша красивая, активная девушка. Она замужем и  имеет двоих детей. У неё очень дружная и крепкая семья,вместе с мужем они живут душа в душу уже много лет. Они работают вместе в частном предприятии, и  их зарплаты хватает только на содержание семьи. Так как Бунафша активная и умная она не хочет остановится на этом и хочет расширить свои знания и получить высшее образование. Она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет получит кредит для оплаты договора обучения.Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Bunafsha is a beautiful, active girl. She is married and has two children. She is very friendly and with her husband has a strong family. They have lived in perfect harmony for many years. They work together in a private enterprise, and their salary is only enough to support the family. Since Bunafsha is active and intelligent, she does not want to stop there and wants to expand her knowledge and gain a higher education. She applied for a loan from Arvand. She wants to get a loan to pay for her tuition. She thanks you and Arvand in advance for your support !!!

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Zebo
