texts.ru: Зебо, трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина в возрасте 33 лет. Она вдова и имеет двоих детей.  У неё была очень дружная и счастливая семья, но к сожалению после нескольких лет их совместной жизни ее муж умер. Она осталось одна с двумя детьми. После смерти мужа, всё свалилось на ее голову, она еле справлялась с обеспечением семьи, тогда ей было очень трудно, ее сердце было разбито и жизнь ей казалось жестоким. Но  спустя годы она все же смирилась с этим и теперь живет ради своих двух жизнерадостных детишек. Сейчас Зебо работает в средней школе, помимо этого она также занимается животноводством. После тяжелого рабочего дня, она приходит домой и ухаживает за  скотом, этим она чуть-чуть подрабатывает, чтобы ее дети жили без нужды. Сейчас у нее очень тяжелый период, так как она не имеет высшее образования  и ее могут уволить с работы, а деньги заработанные животноводством вообще не хватит чтобы прокормить семью. Она решила получить высшее образование. Она  хочет поступит в университет.  Поэтому обратилась в Арванд за кредитом для оплаты учёбы и заранее благодарит за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Zebo, a hardworking and responsible woman who is 33 years old, is a widow with two children. She had a very friendly and happy family, but unfortunately, after several years of marriage, her husband died. She was left alone with two children. After her husband died, everything fell on her head. She could barely cope with maintaining the family. It was very difficult for her: her heart was broken, and her life seemed cruel. But over the years she has pulled herself together, and now lives for the sake of their two lively children. Now Zebo is working in a high school and in animal husbandry. After a hard day's work, she comes home and takes care of the livestock.  She barely earns enough to support her children. She is having a very hard time because she does not have a degree, so she can be fired from her job, and the money she earns from livestock is not enough to feed her family. She decided to pursue higher education. She wants to go to the university. Therefore, she asked Arvand for a loan to pay tuition and thanks you in advance for your support!!!

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Rizagul

texts.ru: Сельское хозяйство является одним из самых трудных рабочих мест, потому что это занимает много тяжелой работы, чтобы двигаться вперед. Но Ризагул никогда не отказалась, несмотря на плохую погоду или на то другое. Она всегда готова найти способ, чтобы обеспечить свою семью. Ризагул прекрасная женщина. Ей 43 года. Она живет вместе семьей на районе Джоми. Она встает с первыми лучами солнца отправиться в земельный участок, где она имеет обязательства работы. У нее есть собственный земельный участок, где она выращивает кукуруза. Ризагул хотелось обработать урожай и почву минеральными удобрениями, чтобы уничтожать микробы и насекомые. Для приобретения минеральных удобрений ей нужно Ваша поддержка. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Agriculture is one of the most difficult jobs because it takes a lot of hard work to get ahead. Rizagul has never given up due to bad weather or anything else. She is always ready to find a way to provide for her family. Rizagul is a wonderful woman. She is 43 and lives with her family in the A. Jomi district. She gets up with the first rays of the sun and goes out to the field where she has responsibilities. She has her own plot of land where she grows corn. Rizagul wants to treat her land and crops with fertilizer to destroy microbes and insects. She needs your support to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El Sr. Edgar es de la ciudad de Itá, se dedica al cultivo de frutilla en la ciudad de Itá, hace varios años, él es casado y también tiene hijos, por quienes está luchando para poder darles una mejor calidad de vida.
Edgar es una persona muy trabajadora que está poniendo todo de sí para poder ser alguien en la vida y ayudar a sus seres queridos y que no les falte nada.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en su campo de cultivo de frutillas, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de mejorar en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Señor Edgar is from the city of Itá, and he has worked growing strawberries in the city of Itá for several years. He is married with children, and he is fighting to be able to give them a better quality of life.

Edgar is a very hardworking person, who is making every effort to be able to be someone in life and to help his loved ones, so that they will lack for nothing.

He is requesting this loan in order to invest it in his strawberry field, so that he will be able to continue working as he has been doing. He appreciates the opportunity that he is receiving to improve in his work.

loans.use: to invest in his strawberry field.

loans.name: Agua De La Vida Iii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AGUA DE VIDA III” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Margarita es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de verduras, venta de mantillas, venta de comida, venta de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Margarita es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de su hermana y mamá hace varios años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de mantas por mayor) que adquirirá de vendedoras mayoristas de la frontera Perú y Bolivia y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “Agua De La Vida III” communal bank is about to start their fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Regional Hub. It has eight members and has a board, of which Margarita is president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank run are varied and include: selling vegetables, selling mantillas, selling food, and selling ponchos. The loan that they are taking out will be of benefit to the microbusinesses included in the communal bank.

Margarita says that she joined Pro Mujer a year ago at the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. She currently has a business selling ponchos. She started this business with the help of her sister and her mother several years ago.

The loan she is requesting is for increasing her capital (buying ponchos wholesale). She will buy from wholesalers on the border of Peru and Bolivia and then sell the products at her stall. This work enables her to generate income to financially support her family since she is in a common-law marriage and has four children.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the training that the institution provides.

loans.use: to buy ponchos wholesale

loans.name: Istatoy

texts.ru:
Истатой 32-летная молодая женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Она работает в пекарне. Они очень любят своих детей, и стараются обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что они желают видеть образованных детей. Но зарплата, которую они получают, недостаточна для покрытия всех имеющихся нужд в семье.  
В данное время Истатой вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где они живут, чтобы улучшить условия для проживания. Но собственных средств у них недостаточно. Для этого Истатой обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Istatoy is a young woman, aged 32. She is married, has three children, and works in a bakery. She loves her children very much and tries with all her might to educate them, because they wish to see educated children. However, the salary they receive is not enough to meet the needs of their family. 

Istatoy and her husband want to renovate their house to improve their living conditions, but they do not have enough money. To do this, Istatoy asked Arvand for a loan to buy building materials to repair their house. She hopes for a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en: From Banban, Siquijor, Marivel earns a living through her clothing sales. She wants to have enough inventory to continuously provide for her family. For her capital needs, PMPC has stood by her since the start of her business. She is happy that she is able to survive the odds of business with determination and her family as her inspiration. To earn more, she applied for a loan to purchase more clothing inventory to sell. Marivel hopes to live comfortably with her children as they finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing inventory to sell.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза хозяйственная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 23 года. Она замужем, пока не имеет детей.  С детства Шахноза хотела научиться шитью у мамы. Ей нравится вышивать красивые платье и придумывать фасоны. Когда она повзрослела  мама научила её вышивать, теперь она знаменитая швея в своем селе и мама очень гордиться ею. Спустя  пару лет Шахноза вышла замуж, теперь она живет с мужем. У них очень большая семья. Ее муж увидев что она очень хочет быть швеёй, решил купить ей швейную машину. Так как ее муж работает строителем и у них большая семья его зарплата не позволяет  и они вместе решили получить кредит в Арванде. В будущем Шахноза уверена что будет очень знаменитой швеёй не только в своем селе, но и в городе. Вместе с мужем заранее благодарят  Арванд за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Shahnoza is a hardworking, skilled housekeeper. She is 23 years old. She is married but has no children yet. Since childhood Shahnoza wanted to learn sewing from her mother. She likes to embroider beautiful dresses and to come up with new styles. As she matured, her mother taught her to embroider. Now, she is a famous seamstress in her village, and her mother is very proud of her. A couple of years later, Shahnoza married and now lives with her husband. They have a very big family. Her husband saw that she really wants to be a seamstress . She decided to buy a sewing machine. Since her husband is a construction worker and they had a large family, his salary will not cover the expense, so together they decided to get a loan from Arvand. In the future, Shahnoza is sure she will be a very famous seamstress, not only in her village, but in the city. She and her husband thank you and Arvand in advance for your support!!!

loans.use: buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Joed

texts.en: Joed wants to be prepared for the next cropping period. He wants to have enough inventory of fertilizer and insecticide for better, healthier and more abundant rice production. He is grateful that he is a member of Paglaum MPC and has access to its financial services for farmers like him. Currently, he avails himself of a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.name: Teogenesa

texts.en: Teogenesa operates a retailing business at Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 81 years old, a widow and an active pensioner member of Paglaum MPC. She has enjoyed all the benefits of membership of the cooperative including but not limited to financial and insurance services. Recently, she has availed herself of a loan to restock noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, junk food, etc..

loans.use: to restock noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, junk food, etc.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is engaged in a boutique and RTW (ready-to-wear) clothing line in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She is making good sales and has a monthly income of approximately PHP 20,000 that sufficiently supports the needs of her family.

Recently, she availed a loan from Paglaum MPC to restock ready-to-wear clothes and other products.

loans.use: to restock ready-to-wear clothes and other products

loans.name: Pedro

texts.en:
Pedro is 69 years old, married from Molave, and from Zamboanga del Sur.

He runs and operates a retailing business in his place. He finds this business more interesting and profitable because the products that he sells are marketable.

He has availed a loan from Paglaum MPC to restock the store with noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, junk food, etc..

loans.use: to restock the store with noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, junk food, etc.

loans.name: Dionesio

texts.en:
Dionesio is a hog raiser in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. He is 36 years old, single, and an active member of Paglaum MPC since 2013. He has a monthly income of PHP 10,000 from his business.

He had expanded his ventures from time to time so that he needs more bags of animal feed.

He availed his sixth loan of PHP 50,000 to buy bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.use: to buy bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en: Jaime is 68 years old and lives in Ozamiz, Ozamiz City. He is married and has two adult children. Jaime owns and operates a business providing transport to local community members for a living. He has been doing this for eight years. He has requested a loan of PHP 18,000 to purchase a slightly used motorcycle. In the future, he hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase a slightly used motorcycle

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru:
Гулмира молодая, общительная девушка. Её 25 лет.  Она  замужем, пока не имеет детей. Она очень активная девушка. Она работает в образовательном центре. После окончания школы она хотела получить высшее образование, но к сожалению ее родители были против. Теперь ее муж, согласился чтобы она училась.  Но у него не хватает денег, для оплаты ее учебы.  
Гулмира обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет получить кредит для оплаты договора обучения. Она надеется на положительный результат и  заранее благодарит за поддержку Арванд!!!
texts.en:
Gulmira is a young, sociable girl. She is 25. She is married, but has no children yet. She is a very active girl. She works in an educational center. After high school, she wanted to pursue a higher education, but unfortunately her parents were against it. Now, her husband has agreed that she study. But, he does not have enough money to pay for her studies.

Gulmira asked Arvand for a loan. She wants to get a loan to pay tuition. She is hoping for a positive result and thanks you and Arvand in advance for your support!!!

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Sayniso

texts.ru: Сайнисо 55 летная мама и жена. У нее трое детей. Детям 18, 18 и 22 года. Она живет вместе семьей в городе Турсунзаде. Турсунзаде красивый город. Жители города умные, честные и целеустремленные. У Сайнисо среднее образование. Она имеет свой частный бизнес. Сайнисо занимается торговлей деятельности. Она на рынке продает персик, вишня, клубника, дыня, винограды и банан. У нее свежие фрукты, и ее клиенты всегда довольны. Сайнисо давно хотела отремонтировать дом и жить уютно. К сожалению, она не смогла копить достаточную сумму для ремонта дома. Теперь она решила взять кредит и отремонтировать дом. Вы можете помочь Сайрисо  финансам.
texts.en: Sayniso is a 55 year old mother and wife. She has three children. Her children are 18, 18 and 22 years old. She lives with her family in Tursin-zoda. The residents of her city are smart, honest, and ambitious. Sayniso has a secondary education. She has her own business. Sayniso works in retail. She sells peaches, cherries, strawberries, melons, grapes and bananas at the market. Her fruits are fresh and her clients are always satisfied. Sayniso has long wanted to renovate her house and she lives cozily. Unfortunately, she was never able to save up enough to renovate. Now she has decided to apply for a loan and renovate her house. You can help Sayniso.

loans.use: to renovate her home.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a responsible mother who requests a loan from Paglaum MPC, which she will use to increase her inventory. She wants to buy more kilos of fruit to sell.

This way, she will be able to sell more products which will allow her to earn more money and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Behelia

texts.en:
Behelia has mastered her farming business in Palayan, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. This is how she makes a living and is able to support her family. She was truly grateful to avail credit to fully support her business. Just as how she takes care her farming business and so with her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so she can always run for any financing needs.

Now the loan of Php 7,000 will help her to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 62 years old she is married with adult-age children. She has been a wholesaler of bananas in their town for almost 20 years. From this long time experience of selling, she already has high knowledge in dealing this kind of business. Even though there are many competitors in the town, Erlinda still get more customers than the rest due to her good salesmanship and characteristic effort. She has been successful over the years and manages to save more money for her family.

For now, Erlinda is planning to buy a parcel of land in order for her to manage a new business, which is creating a small pigpen for additional income in the near future.

To fund this project, she needs additional capital to purchase 10 tons of bananas to wholesale, so she has requested a loan from Paglaum-MPC.

loans.use: to purchase 10 tons of bananas to wholesale.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. 

Trinidad is able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune.

Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil and soy sauce.

In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil and soy sauce.

loans.name: Shirinoy

texts.ru: Шириной молодая женщина проживающая в сельской местности. Ей 31 год, она  замужем и имеет на иждивении 3 детей. Муж Шириной работает в России на частной стройке подсобным рабочим.  Тех деньги, что он отправляет не хватает для того, чтобы обеспечивать семью.  Сама Шириной вот уже на протяжении 8 лет занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота. Она покупает молодняк и откармливает несколько месяцев,  потом продает за более высокую цену. Ее бизнес является основным источником дохода для ее семьи, благодаря своему бизнесу ее семья обеспеченна и ни в чем не нуждается.Шириной хочет, чтобы ее дети смогли получить достойное образование и работать по специальности, а не мучатся как родители. На данный момент у Шириной возникли трудности в бизнесе, она не может продать скот из-за низкой цены. Ей нужно закупить корм для скота и с этой проблемой она решила обратиться в «АРВАНД» за финансовой поддержкой. На полученные деньги она хочет закупить корм для скота и воспользовавшись моментом заодно закупить молодой скот по низкой цене.
texts.en: Shirinoy is a young woman who lives in the countryside. She is 31 years old. She is married and has three small children. Shirinoy's husband works in Russia as a construction worker. The money that he sends is not enough to support his family. Shirinoy has been breeding cattle for eight years. She buys them young, fattens them a few months, then sells them for a higher price. Her business is the main source of income for her family. Because of her business, her family does not want for anything. Shirinoy wants her children to be able to get a decent education and work in their specialty, and not live in torment like their parents. At the moment, Shirinoy is having problems with her business. She cannot sell livestock due to the low prices. She needs to buy food for livestock. So, because of this problem, she decided to apply to Arvand for financial support. With the money, she wants to purchase livestock feed and at the same time take advantage of the prices to buy young cattle at a low price.

loans.use: buy cattle.

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.en:
Bernarda is managing her eatery business in Tangub city. She mastered the business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. This has been doing well supporting the needs of the family. She has local customers and would also accept catering for added income.

Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business. She wants to expand her business and would be more happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business

location.town: Tangub-P-7 Polao Tangub City  Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 36 years old; she is married with two school-age children, and is known in the Tudela area for her "suman" (Filipino snack made of glutinous rice) business. She mastered this business after she married her husband. She's making good sales and wants to make a good fortune for her business.

Currently, she avails a loan from Paglaum MPC to purchase ingredients for her "suman" business, such as glutinous rice, raw sugar, margarine, peanuts and coconut.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her suman business, such as glutinous rice, raw sugar, margarine, peanuts and coconut.

loans.name: Amigas De Tarapaca Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMIGAS DE TARAPACA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Demetria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, carnicería, venta de pasankalla (pipocas de maíz), venta de frutas, venta de polleras, servicio de té, venta de comida, venta de regalos. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Demetria es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a  Pro Mujer por una promoción de una asesora que es parte de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace más de diez años, de su esposo. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital, (compra de fideo y gaseosas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Civil Association team "Amigas de Tarapaca" (Tarapaca Friends) will start their first cycle with "Pro Mujer" (Pro Woman), as part of the Focal Center Senkata. It is made up of 10 members and headed by a board where Mrs. Demetria is the President. The businesses that the team members have are varied, among them: grocery store, butcher shop, popcorn shop, fruit shop, traditional skirt store, tea shop, food sales and gift shop.

The requested loan will benefit many micro-enterprises such as the one Mrs. Demetria is part of. She tells us that she joined "Pro Mujer" when a consultant that is part of it was running a promotional campaign. Her present business is a small grocery store, which she tells us she started with her husband over ten years ago.

The loan will provide an increase of capital for the purchase of wholesale noodles and soft-drinks, which she will buy from the wholesale store in the city of El Alto, to subsequently sell them in her retail space. This way of working allows her to to generate resources to support her family financially, since she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes from "Pro Mujer", she tells us that she likes the health services area that the institution offers.

loans.use: purchase of wholesale noodles and soft-drinks.

loans.name: San Agustin Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Agustin está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cinco señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
La Sra. Blanca solicita de este préstamo para la compra de productos variados para poder surtir su despensa, como ser: verduras, panificados, lácteos, frutas y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Blanca comenta que inicio su negocio muy pequeño con mucho esfuerzo y lucha, y que hoy ya es muy conocida en el barrio.
Blanca agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group San Agustin [Saint Augustine] is doing a poverty elimination survey. Five women are under the poverty line, which is to say that they are fighting to improve their life conditions as well as those of their loved ones.

Blanca is seeking this loan to buy various products to be able to stock her small grocery store, for example: vegetables, baked goods, dairy products, fruits, and other goods. In this way she can continue her work as she is doing now. Blanca says that she started her very small business with much effort and struggle, and that today she is very well known in her community.

Blanca expresses her gratitude for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to improve her life conditions and those of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, baked goods, dairy products, fruits, and other goods.

loans.name: Nụ

texts.en:
Nụ is 53 years old and she is married with two children.

Mrs. Nụ works in agriculture, planting fruit trees. Nụ has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. This is Nụ's only source of income.

She lives and works in Dong Son district, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a new toilet.

This is Nụ's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.

In the future, Nụ hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Eleitino

texts.en:
Eleitino is 67 years old, with 6 children. She operates a business of selling bananas and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Eleitino has requested a loan to buy banana tube (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a water tank, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel, chemicals, and a backpack sprayer to assist her run the business. 

She joined SPBD in 2002, and she hopes to use her profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tube (seedlings), taro roots(seedlings), a wheelbarrow, and various other tools.

loans.name: Khược

texts.en:
Khược is 62 years old, and he is married, with 2 children.  He lives and works in Dong Son district, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Khược works in agriculture, raising poultry and cattle.  He has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. This is Khược’s only source of income.

One of the most critical difficulties that concern him is not having a hygienic latrine.  He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a new toilet.

This is Khược's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. He hopes that this loan could make his little dream come true.

In the future, Khược hopes for his children to find a good job, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his business to do well.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a new toilet

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboracion de bolsos y carteras desde hace 15 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar sus vivienda cambiando el techo pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para pode tener una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria, 53 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She has made bags and wallets for 15 years. Through that which she gains from her sales she is able to cover some home expenses. 

She wants to improve her home by changing the roof, but as she does not have sufficient capital, she is seeking a loan to buy metal sheets and poles and pay for the labor costs to be able to have a better home.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and poles and pay for labor

loans.name: Ruth Julie

texts.es: Ruth es una empresaria independiente que emprendió su propio negocio con el apoyo de su suegro en el año 2012; al conocer su ardua situación económica en el hogar porque tan solo su cónyuge era quien conseguía los recursos para el sustento familiar,  le suministro los primeros artículos para que iniciara su vida comercial.  Posteriormente Ruth se incorporó a la modalidad de ventas masiva y contó con éxito en la promoción de diferentes artículos de uso personal entre ellos lociones, cremas, cosméticos, desodorantes, shampoo y demás productos. Actualmente comercializa los productos que se encuentren en la vigencia del catálogo a sus clientes que se encuentran en este mismo sector donde reside en el municipio de Malambo. Como su capital no es suficiente para responder a las solicitudes de pedidos de sus clientes, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar perfumes y accesorios solicitados por sus clientes.  Ruth ha logrado generar ingresos para apoyar a su cónyuge sin descuidar a su pequeño hijo de tres años de edad a quien desea ofrecerle una educación de calidad y mayor bienestar. Su meta a futuro realizarle adecuaciones a sus vivienda.
texts.en:
Ruth is an independent businesswoman who started her own business with the support of her father-in-law in 2012; when he learned of her difficult financial situation at home because her spouse was the only one who earned money to support their family, he gave her the first items so she'd be able to start her life in sales. Ruth then incorporated the mode of large-scale sales and had success selling various personal use items including lotions, creams, cosmetics, deodorants, shampoo and other products. Currently she sells products found in a catalog to her customers, who she finds in the same area where she lives, in the city of Malambo. 

Since her capital isn't sufficient to respond to the requests from her customers, she is applying for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy perfumes and accessories requested by her customers. Ruth has been able to earn money to support her spouse without neglecting her small three-year-old son, who she wants to offer a quality education and greater well-being. Her future goal is to renovate her home.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and accessories requested by her customers

loans.name: Patricia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Patricia, de 31 años de edad, está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor y en su casa solo vive su pareja y sus 3 hijos. 

Patricia, es ama de casa, pero también le ayuda a su pareja con los trabajos agrícolas, porque es de ahí que llevan el sustento diario a su casa. 

Patricia, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas que  necesita para sembrar granos básicos y poder obtener una buena cosecha. 

Ella desea seguir trabajando y ver a sus hijos felices y con una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Patricia is 31 years old. She is in a relationship and her partner is a farmer. She lives in her house with only her partner and their three children.

Patricia is a housewife but she also helps her partner with the agricultural work as this is the way they provide the daily sustenance for their household.

Patricia needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs like manure, pesticides and herbicides that she needs to plant basic grains and be able to have a good harvest.

She wants to continue to work and see her children happy and with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like manure, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Dulce Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “DULCE AMANECER” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora  Marina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chalecos, venta de muebles, venta de verduras, venta de mantas, venta de ropa deportiva, servicio de amplificación. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Marina es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa deportiva; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace seis años por iniciativa propia. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de telas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The  “DULCE AMANECER” communal bank will begin its first loan cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Los Andes regional office. It is made up of 8 members and led by a board of directors of which Marina is the chairperson.The members of the association carry on a variety of businesses, including sale of jackets, sale of furniture, sale of vegetables, sale of shawls, sale of sports clothing, and sound system services.

The loan they will take out will benefit small business owners like Marina. She says she joined Pro Mujer at the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. Currently she has a business selling sports clothing, which she indicates she started 6 years ago through her own initiative.

The loan she will take out now is to increase her working capital (purchase of fabric at wholesale) which she will acquire from the wholesale dealers in the city of La Paz, and then, after making it into clothing, will sell it at her stand. This type of work will allow her to generate income for supporting her family, as she is in a common-law relationship and has a son.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health clinic that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale

loans.name: Pamata

texts.en:
Pamata is a 59-year-old mother, with 7 children. 

She runs a business selling elei print materials at the market to earn a living.  She has requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paints, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine to help her run the business. 

She has been doing this for more than a year. She  will use her profit to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paints, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine

loans.name: Gerson Tulio

texts.es: Don Gerson, tiene 57 años de edad,  está casado, tiene un hijo y vive en un sector de Cofradía, Cortes con su familia. Anteriormente trabajaba por jornadas (asalariado). Hace 5 años junto con su esposa estableció su negocio de venta de comidas, vende pastelitos rellenos con carne y jugos naturales de varias frutas como naranja, tamarindo, mora, maracuyá y otros. Don Gerson vende de forma ambulante, se coloca a orilla de la calle y ofrece su producto. Ha solicitado un préstamo por un monto de 5,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos para elaborar los pastelitos, agua, bolsas, azúcar y frutas para elaborar los jugos y vender con el fin de seguir trabajando y obteniendo ingresos para subsistir. Su plan es tener un local fijo para el negocio.
texts.en:
Don Gerson is 57 years old, married and has one son. He lives in Sector Cofradia, Cortes with his family. He used to work as a salaried employed but 5 years ago decided to start his own business selling food with his wife. He sells turnovers filled with meat and natural juices from various fruits like oranges, tamarind, blackberry, passion fruit, among others. Don Gerson sells his products on the side of the street.
He's requesting a loan of 5,000 Lempiras to buy foodstuffs for making his turnovers and water, bags, and fruits to make his juices for sale. His goal is to keep working and generating income to survive. His plan is to have a fixed store for his business.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs for making his turnovers and water, bags, and fruits to make his juices for sale.

loans.name: Lucia Esperanza

texts.es:
La justicia es una de las aptitudes que según Lucia es muy importante para el crecimiento de la sociedad. Por esta razón y la del amor a las leyes, ella decidió estudiar la licenciatura en Derecho. Ahora está en segundo año y se siente proyectada en un futuro prometedor como una excelente abogada. Ella cuenta con el apoyo de su madre, quien es docente universitaria, y de su hermana que trabaja en una empresa de gobierno. 
A sus 18 años, esta joven además de estudiar su carrera universitaria, estudia inglés, pues considera que el aprender otro idioma te abre puertas culturales y profesionales. Por esta razón, ella desea seguir invirtiendo en su crecimiento académico solicitando un préstamo para cancelar el curso completo de inglés, comprar materiales didácticos, como libros, y una computadora portátil, ya que se quiere perfilar no como una de las mejores alumnas, sino como la mejor alumna de su carrera y culminar su carrera con honores.  En sus planes está realizar un posgrado y luego una maestría.
texts.en:
Justice is one of the competencies which according to Lucia is very important for the growth of society. For this reason and for the love of laws, she decided to study for a degree in law. Now she is in her second year and she feels projected into a promising future as an excellent lawyer. She has the support of her mother who is a university instructor and her sister who works in a government enterprise.

At 18 years of age, this young woman in addition to her university course, studies English, since she considers that learning another language opens doors culturally and professionally. For this reason, she wishes to continue investing in her academic growth requesting a loan in order to write off her whole English course; to buy instructional materials, such as books; and a portable computer, since she wants to profile not as one of the best students, but as the best student in her course and complete her course of study with honors. Her plans are to get in a post-graduate program and then get a Master's degree.

loans.use: to pay for an English course and buy instructional materials and a computer.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is married, with 2 children, and lives in Bundibugyo ,Uganda.

She is a farmer who grows cocoa and also buys from other cocoa farmers. She also sells clothing in order to raise money to support her family.


Lilian is seeking a loan to buy cocoa to sell.  Like most cocoa farmers, she faces unpredictable weather changes and price fluctuations, but her dreams are to expand her cocoa business and diversify into different sectors.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Angel Roberto

texts.es:
Ángel es un joven de 20 años, vive junto a sus padres en el recinto El Cisne, sector perteneciente a Santo Domingo, caracterizado por, aquí se da mucho el plátano para la exportación.
Ángel con el apoyo de sus padres pudo comprarse un bus, ya que terminó el colegio y necesitaba trabajar, comenta que le ha ido muy bien en este tiempo, gracias a estos ingresos ha podido pagar el puesto y a sacar adelante a su familia, apoyarles mucho como le dieron la mano a él.
Ángel es cliente nuevo para la institución, vino recomendado por una muy buena clienta de la fundación, ahora con este crédito él podrá hacer mantenimiento y mejoras al vehículo y además va a adquirir experiencia crediticia; está  muy feliz y agradecido por el apoyo que dan a los microempresarios, además por dar las capacitaciones que la institución brinda a los clientes para que puedan mejorar mejor sus ingresos y dar una mejor atención.
texts.en:
Ángel is a young man, age twenty, who lives with his parents in the El Cisne precinct, a sector of Santo Domingo which is characterized by the many bananas that are grown here for export.

With his parents' support, Ángel was able to purchase a bus, as he had finished high school and needed to work. He comments that it has been going very well for him already, and thanks to this income, he has been able to keep up with the payments and provide for his family, supporting them just as they had supported him.

Ángel is a new client of the institution, who came recommended by a very good client of the foundation. Now, with this loan, he will be able to maintain and improve his vehicle, and in addition, he is going to gain credit experience.

He is very happy and grateful for the support that they are giving to micro-entrepreneurs, in addition to the training that the institution provides for clients, so that they can improve their income and provide better service.

loans.use: to maintain his working tool, and continue providing safe and punctual service to his customers.

loans.name: Iasinta

texts.en:
Iasinta is a 64-year-old mother with seven children. She is still fit and healthy to run her business of selling taro and bananas in her village to earn a living with the help of her children.

Iasinta requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, taro roots (seedlings), banana tubes (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves, to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her family's needs.

She became a member of SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, taro roots (seedlings), banana tubes (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves.

loans.name: Asofou

texts.en:
Asofou is a 59-year-old mother with four children. She runs a business of selling taro and bananas in her village to earn a living.

Asofou requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tubes (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves, to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business.

She became a member of SPBD in 2011.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tubes (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves.

loans.name: Alasa

texts.en:
Alasa is a 46-year-old mother with five children. She runs a small business of cooking rice and curry and sells it in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year.

Alasa requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, sack of onions, plastic bags, and a container, to help her run the business. She will use her profit to build a small restaurant in the near future.

She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, sack of onions, plastic bags, and a container.

loans.name: Sandro

texts.es:
Sandro es estudiante de la carrera de Administración Agropecuaria, actualmente es empleado de una empresa, su principal objetivo es terminar su carrera ascender de cargo, tener mayores ingresos para poder ayudarle a sus estudiantes.
Sandro es una persona que está luchando por sus metas y anhelos. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en: Sandro is a student in the field of Agricultural Administration. He is currently working for a company. His main goal is to finish his degree, get a promotion and earn more so he can help his students. Sandro is a person who is struggling  to achieve his goals and desires . He is requesting this loan to pay his university fees and continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior le ha sido de mucha ayuda para poder seguir con sus estudios, ya que pudo pagar las cuotas de su carrera, es una persona muy sacrificada que esta luchando para poder ser alguien en la vida. 
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Pedro is from the city of Ybycuí. He says that his previous loan helped him very much to be able to continue studying, since it enabled him to pay the tuition for his program of study. He is a very dedicated person who is striving to be somebody in life.

Today, he is asking for this new loan in order to be able to pay for the tuition for his courses, so that he can continue in his program of study.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara viene de una familia trabajadora con deseos de superación, está estudiando la carrera en psicología, y por medio de sus estudios quiere abrirse camino al mundo laboral.
Sara quiere ser una profesional que quiere salir adelante para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos variados de universidad, y así seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sara comes from a hardworking family with a drive to succeed. She is studying psychology, and through her studies wants to open a path to the work world. Sara wants to be a professional, and wants to succeed in order to help her family.

She seeks this loan in order to pay various university costs, so that she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay various university costs.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan is 54 years old, and she is married. Loan lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover, her region often suffered from natural disasters such as floods and drought.  The income from her business is not high enough to do what she needs to comfort her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is her latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet.

Loan joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution this year.  She hopes that this loan can make her little dream come true.

Cao Thị Loan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy; to travel internationally for a vacation, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
La visión de emprendedor, se refleja en la piel de José, un comerciante de 33 años de edad que cuenta su historia de ser un empleado hasta convertirse en empleador en la venta de platanitos fritos. Todo comenzó a sus 18 años friendo en una fábrica de elaboración de platanitos durante siete años, para que luego, durante seis años, vendiera de forma ambulante el mismo producto que fría en la fábrica donde antes trabajaba. Ahora, con dos hijos de 12 y 4 años de edad, y una esposa que lo apoya al cien por ciento, ya estableció su propia empresa de elaboración y venta de platanitos, papas y malanga, cumpliendo hace poco los dos años de haber iniciado.
Su negocio se ha convertido en uno de los más solicitados en las universidades y pulperías, además de convertirse en una fuente de empleo, pues ya tiene a dos personas trabajando junto a él. José se siente muy orgulloso de su crecimiento, por lo que le gusta invertir constantemente en ello, por esta razón, solicita un préstamo para comprar plátanos, malanga, aceite, bolsas, entre otros productos indispensables para la elaboración de este aperitivo. Esto le permitirá cumplir en tiempo y forma sus pedidos y ahora para convertirse en una gran fábrica para crecer económicamente y generar muchos más empleos.
texts.en:
The vision of an entrepreneur is reflected in the the skin of José, a 33 year old businessman in the sale of fried plantains, who tells a story of being an employee until converting into an employer. When he was 18 years old he began frying in a facility that processes plantains, where he worked for seven years. For six years he then sold, as a street vendor, the same product he fried in the facility where he previously worked.

Now, with two children aged 12 and 4, and a wife who supports him 100%, he established his own business, processing and selling plantains, potatoes and taro. He just recently completed two years in this business. His business has turned into one of the most sought after in the universities and corner stores. It is also a source of employment, as he now has two people working with him.

José is very proud of his growth, and likes to constantly invest in his business. For that reason, he seeks a loan to buy plantains, taro, oil and bags, among other products needed to make this snack. This will allow him to fill his orders in a timely manner, and to save in order to convert into a big facility, in order to grow economically and to generate many more jobs.

loans.use: to buy plantains, taro, oil and bags, among other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goats to sell.

loans.name: Jesús Antonio

texts.es:
Jesús, de 28 años de edad, es muy responsable y trabajador, está soltero y vive con su madre, quien tiene una tienda en su casa y él trabaja para ayudarle a ella con los gastos del hogar y para comprarle sus medicinas. 

Jesús, trabaja como empleado en un local de renta de automóviles desde hace dos años, de esa manera el obtiene ingresos para cubrir los gastos de la casa y ayudar a su mamá con los gastos de medicina de ella.  

Jesús, necesita el crédito para surtir la tienda de su madre con productos como arroz, frijoles, pan, café, detergentes y para comprar un refrigerador para almacenar los productos perecederos, su objetivo es que su mamá pueda seguir administrando su pequeña tienda, y también que siga generando ganancias de ese negocio.  

Jesús, sueña con brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su mamá; pero también sueña con construir su propia vivienda para cuando el se case.
texts.en:
Jesús, age twenty-eight, is very responsible and hardworking. He is single, and lives with his mother, who has a store in her house, and he works in order to help her with the household expenses and to purchase her medications for her.

Jesús has been working as an employee in an automobile rental shop for two years, and in this way he earns income to cover the household expenses and help his mom with the costs of her medications.

Jesús needs the loan in order to stock his mother's store with products such as rice, beans, bread, coffee, and detergent, and to purchase a refrigerator to store the perishable products. His objective is that his mom may continue running her little store, and continue generating earnings from that business.

Jesús dreams of providing a better quality of life for his mom, but he also dreams of building his own house for when he gets married.

loans.use: to stock his mother's store with products such as rice, beans, bread, coffee, and detergent, and to purchase a refrigerator to store the perishable products.

loans.name: Esteysi Roxana

texts.es:
Esteysi, de 36 años de edad, es una señora muy humilde y trabajadora, actualmente vive con sus dos hijos de 16 y 18 años de edad, su esposo debido a la insolvencia económica que tenían, decidió emigrar a los Estados Unidos en busca de mejores condiciones de vida para su familia.

Esteysi, se dedica a vender pupusas en su casa de lunes a viernes, el sábado descansa y los domingos vende frutas y verduras en la iglesia del cantón, aprovechando que todos los domingos se celebran misas en la iglesia. 

El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para comprar más mobiliario como mesas y sillas, para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y puedan llegar más personas a comprar. 

Su sueño es tener una casa mucho más grande y bien amueblada, para que sus hijos vivan más comodos.
texts.en:
Esteysi, 36, is a humble and hard-working woman. Now she lives with her two children, 16 and 18. Because of the economic insolvency that they had, her husband emigrated to the United States in search of better living conditions for his family.

Esteysi makes a living selling stuffed tortillas out of her house Monday through Friday. Saturdays she rests and on Sundays she sells fruits and vegetables at the local church, taking advantage of the fact that every Sunday they celebrate mass in the church.

She needs the money from the loan in order to buy more furniture such as tables and chairs so as to offer better service to her customers and so more people could come to buy.

Her dream is to have a much larger and well-furnished house so that her children can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy more furniture such as tables and chairs for her stuffed tortilla shop.

loans.name: Junior

texts.es:
Junior vive con sus padres, trabaja con sus tíos y está en el último año de la facultad. Está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y lucha para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Su meta luego de terminar su carrera universitaria es montar su propio negocio en el cual pueda llevar acabo sus sueños y objetivos.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, para poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Junior lives with his parents, works with his uncles, and is in his last year of college. He is studying for a degree in business administration, and striving to be able to be someone in life. His goal after finishing his university degree is to start his own business to achieve his dreams and objectives. He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his tuition expenses, to be able to meet this expense he has and to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Simalu

texts.en: Simalu is a 43-year-old mother with four children. She runs a small business selling taro and banana in her village to earn a living. Simalu requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves to help her run the business. She became a member of SPBD in 2012, and she will use her profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, and hand gloves,.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es estudiante de la carrera de odontología y estética dental, su objetivo es especializarse en ambas áreas, se desempeña como secretaria de medio tiempo en una consultora para solventar sus gastos universitarios. 
Es una persona que está luchando para poder ser alguien en la vida, y por medio de sus estudios poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Daniela is an Odontology and Cosmetic Dentistry student; her goal is to specialize in both areas. She is currently working as a part time secretary in a consultancy office to pay for her university expenses.

She is a person who is striving to be somebody in life, and through her career, be able to help her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay for her university tuition so that she may carry on studying, as she has thus far.

loans.use: pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina used her previous loan to purchase more second hand clothes to sell during the Christmas season. . She still owns a boutique of second hand clothes to earn a living. She earns additional income from rentals. She started her business to improve her standard of living. She faces the challenges of price fluctuations, high inflation rates and high license fees but has hopes that she will re-invest and become a very rich woman.

Regina is requesting a loan to buy second hand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more second hand clothes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose es un joven estudiante, es de la ciudad de Santaní, es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta y  responsable es muy dedicada al estudio, desea sobresalir adelante profesionalmente.
Jose está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, para poder ser un buen abogado y por medio de sus estudios poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
José is a young student from the city of Santaní. He is a very hardworking, honest, responsible person, who is very devoted to studying, and he wants to excel and get ahead professionally.

José is studying law, so that he can be a good attorney and get ahead by means of his studies.

He is requesting this loan to pay his tuition so that he will be able to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es:
Rosa, de 35 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos, todos estudian y también le ayudan con los trabajos de la casa. 

Rosa, es ama de casa, pero debido a su soltería ha tenido que trabajar de diferentes maneras para sacar adelante a sus hijos, actualmente trabaja en la agricultura y siembra maíz y frijol, para poder sostener a su familia. 

Rosa, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para aplicarlos a sus cultivos de maíz y frijol, para poder obtener una buena cosecha para fin del año. 

Rosa, desea ver a sus hijos formados academicamente y tengan éxito en su vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 35, is a single mother. She has three children. They all study and also help her with the housework.

Rosa is a housewife, but because of being single she has had to work in different ways to bring up her children. Nowadays, she works in agriculture and plants corn and beans in order to sustain her family.

Rosa needs the loan to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides to apply to her corn and bean crops in order to obtain a good harvest by the end of the year.

Rosa wants to see her children well-educated and to have success in their lives.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides to apply to her corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Papua

texts.en: Papua is 36 years old with one child. She owns and operates a small business cooking and selling BBQ in her community to earn a living. Papua requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, a box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas and a sack of rice to help her run the business. She hopes to build a small restaurant in the near future using her business profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, a box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, and a sack of rice,

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: La señora Bertha tiene 37 años de edad vive actualmente en domicilio alquilado tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella, no tiene esposo es madre soltera, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio de Monteagudo y trabaja en la misma localidad. Su principal actividad de la señora Bertha es la producción y venta de pan, trabaja arduamente en su actividad de lunes a domingo para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos, alquiler y otros gastos que incurren en su hogar. Es por eso que requiere el préstamo que será destinado para la compra  de insumos para la elaboración de pan y compra de un horno a gas para ampliar su negocio, con la compra de la misma la Sra. aumentará su actividad de producción y venta de pan por lo tanto podrá aumentar de manera eficiente y obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar con su hijos.
texts.en: Bertha is 37 years old and currently lives in a rented home. She has two children who depend on her; she doesn't have a husband, is a single mother, and lives and works in the department of Chuquisaca and city of Monteagudo. Bertha's primary business is the production and sale of bread. She works hard at her business from Monday to Sunday to cover expenses of food, clothing, basic services, rent and other household expenses they incur. This is why she needs the loan, which will be destined for buying supplies to make bread and to buy a gas oven to expand her business. With this purchase, Bertha will increase her business producing and selling bread. She will therefore be able to grow efficiently and obtain greater earnings, and to improve her living conditions in her home with her children.

loans.use: to buy a gas oven and supplies to make bread, and to expand her business to generate greater earnings for her family

loans.name: Melva Luz

texts.es: Melva es una empresaria independiente que confecciona desde su hogar prendas de vestir y accesorios en tejido crochet, ella inició esta actividad en el año 2010 con el ánimo de emprender nuevos retos que le permitieran mantenerse en actividad constante y generando ingresos adicionales para el sustento de su familia. Cuando lanzó su primera colección artesanal obtuvo una gran acogida por sus vecinos y amigos de su hija, desde entonces Melva labora 8 horas diarias en sus creaciones, las cuales son sobre pedido, sin embargo su capital de trabajo es insuficiente para responder oportunamente a los requerimientos de su clientela; para mitigar esta situación está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de hilo crochet e insumos necesarios.  Con esta inversión sus ventas incrementaran al igual que sus utilidades.  Su meta a futuro es fortalecer su capital y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Melva is an independent businesswoman who makes crocheted articles of clothing and accessories out of her home. She began this work in 2010 with the desire to take up new challenges which would allow her to stay in constant activity and generate additional income to sustain her family.

When she introduced her first handicraft collection, she got a great reception from her neighbors and friends of her daughter. Since then, Melva works eight hours a day on her creations, which are by request. Nevertheless, her working capital is insufficient to respond to the requirements of her customers.

In order to mitigate this situation, she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation which she will invest in the purchase of crochet yarn and necessary supplies. With this investment, her sales will increase along with her profitability. Her future goal is to strengthen her capital and improve her income.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of crochet yarn and necessary supplies.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta, de 44 años de edad, está casada, su esposo es agricultor y cultiva frijol, maicillo y maíz, los cuales representan el consumo diario de la familia, porque son granos de primera necesidad para el hogar.

Marta, es ama de casa pero también se dedica a la crianza de especies menores tales como cerdos y aves de corral, con este tipo de negocio ha logrado llevar el sustento a su familia. 

El dinero del préstamo lo usará para comprar insumos agrícolas y para comprar cerdos para destazar, porque ella ha desempeñado este negocio desde hace mucho tiempo y conoce muy bien el mercado y zona en donde vive.

Marta, sueña con seguir trabajando y brindarle todo lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Marta, age 44, is married, and her husband is a farmer. He grows beans, sorghum, and corn, which represent the family's daily consumption, because they are the basic household grains.

Marta is a housewife, but she also raises small animals such as pigs and poultry, and she has been able to provide for her family with this type of business.

She will use the loan money to purchase agricultural supplies and pigs to butcher, because she has been working at this business for a long time, and she knows the market and zone in which she lives very well.

Marta dreams of continuing to work, and of giving her family everything that they need.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies and pigs to butcher.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moises es un joven hombre de 22 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es la fabricación de zapatos artesanales.
Él es inteligente, emprendedor y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la urbanización ‘Aurelia’ zona limítrofe entre área rural y urbana. 
Moises es moreno de baja estatura y físico delgado. Su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español. Su negocio es la fabricación de zapatos tradicionales de cholita, estos se caracterizan por ser de taco bajo y ser muy influenciados por la moda, las personas que lo utilizan son mujeres de vestir tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera) y también los utilizan para las danzas tradicionales vistiendo todo el atuendo tradicional, “mi padre me enseñó el oficio, ya me independicé y necesito máquinas para continuar…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas continuas, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de una máquina de coser recta y ampliación de su taller. Su sueño es estabilizar su negocio, él desea realizar la compra de una máquina de coser recta y pagar los gastos para la ampliación de su taller. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Moises solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de coser recta y pagar los gastos para la ampliación de su taller.
texts.en:
Moises is a single, 22 year old youth who has no children. His business is making hand-make shoes. He is intelligent, enterprising and very hard-working. He does his business in the ‘Aurelia’ neighborhood an area that borders the rural and the city.

Moises is dark-skinned, short and thin. His native language is Aymará and he speaks Spanish. His business is making traditional cholito (native) shoes which are characterized by a low heel and are strongly influenced by fashion. The people that use them are women who wear traditional clothing (hats, shawls and skirts) and they are also used for traditional dancing that use all traditional attire.

"My father taught taught me the trade and I became independent and need machines in order to continue" he commented. The advantage of his business is that it has continual sales, his disadvantage is the lack of capital to buy a straight stitch sewing machine and pay for the cost to expand his workshop. His dream is to stabilize his business. This is his first loan with the institution in the two years he has run his business.

For these reasons Moises is requesting a loan to buy a straight stitch sewing machine and pay for the cost of expanding his workshop.

loans.use: to buy a straight stitch sewing machine and pay to make his workshop larger.

loans.name: Amelinda

texts.en:
Amelinda is from Bien, Unido Bohol. She is 56 years old and married with nine children, who are mostly adults. She is engaged in farming rice, raising hogs, and selling home-cooked snacks like pancakes and steamed rice cakes.

She is asking for a loan to buy feed and flour. Amelinda is optimistic that with her hard work and perseverance, she can make a difference in the life of her family, especially for her youngest child who is 17 years old. Her income will help for her child's school fees. Her profits will pay for the healthy diet of her family and reinvestment in the same businesses.

loans.use: to buy feed and flour.

loans.name: Dania

texts.es:
Dania proviene de una familia humilde y trabajadora, con aspiraciones de superación, esté estudiando la carrera de derecho, y por medio de sus estudios quiere salir adelante para ser alguien en la vida.
Ella es una persona muy sacrificada que quiere ser alguien en la vida para ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Dania comes from a humble and hard-working family who want to improve their situation. Dania is studying law, and through her studies wants to get ahead and to "be somebody" in this life.
Dania is a very selfless person who wants to "be somebody" in this life so she can help her family.
She is asking for this loan so she can pay her university fees and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
Cristhian está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Agropecuaria en un futuro quiere recibirse, ayudar a su familia. Está trabajando en una Veterinaria actualmente, y comenta que su idea es trabajar más adelante e independizarse.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo de poder crecer y mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
Cristhian is studying toward a degree in Agricultural Engineering. In the future, he wants to graduate and to help out his family.  He is currently working in an animal hospital and says that his plan is to work and later go out on his own.  
Cristhian is asking for his loan to pay his university fees so that he can keep on with what he is doing.  He is grateful for the help he is receiving so he can grow and improve his life.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Shamsihol

texts.ru: Шамсихол живет на районе Шахритус. Ей 43 лет. Она семейная женщина. Шамсихол довольная женщина в своей жизни. Она занимается растениеводством. Шамсихол на своей земле выращивает помидоры. Пришло время обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получит здоровый и качественный урожай. Средства получены от займов пойдут на минеральные удобрения. Шамсихол старается, чтоб люди принимали здоровую пищу без химикатов. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Shamsihol lives in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  She is a 43-year-old wife and mother and she is happy with her life.  She works in agriculture, growing tomatoes on her own land.  Time has come to prepare her land with mineral fertilizers, so that she can get a healthy and abundant harvest.  Shamsihol will use her loan to buy mineral fertilizers.  She's trying to do what she can so that people get healthy foods, grown without any chemicals.  She looks forward to your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Cristy Ann

texts.en:
Cristy Ann is 25 years old. She lives in her town called San Miguel in Bohol province. Cristy Ann has two children ages 5 and 6. She is engaged in rice farming and selling of electronic mobile top up to support her children while her partner drives a motorcycle to earn a living.

She is asking a loan to buy fertilizer and pay for labor of the hired farmers. This will allow her to finance and continue her business for her family. Her profits will be used to buy a healthy diet for her family, for savings, and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor of the hired farmers.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is 61 years old and from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He is married with ten children, who are mostly adult. Four of them are still ages 12-18 and they are under his care.

Farming rice has been his source of income for his family for 17 years now. He wanted to give his kids a better future, the very reason why he is working hard on his farming business and requesting a loan to improve his yield.

The loan will be used to buy fertilizer and pay for the hired farmers who will be helping in planting season. His profit will be use to finance his children’s schooling and future savings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for the hired farmers who will be helping in planting season

loans.name: William Virgilio

texts.es:
Willian, de 36 años de edad, solo estudio hasta sexto grado, dejó de estudiar por falta de recursos económicos; está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar a su suegra.

Willian, se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas desde su juventud, junto a su padre trabajó la tierra, pero ahora aparte de la agricultura, trabaja repartiendo encomiendas en una ciudad cercana y eso le genera ingresos extra.- Actualmente Willian, tiene sembrados 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, él vende las mazorcas y deja una parte de la cosecha para el consumo familiar y tiene 15 a¬ños de cultivar sus propios granos.

El crédito será invertido para comprar abono, fertilizantes y gasolina para la bomba con la que riega los cultivos, para que produzcan más sus cosechas y pueda tener mejores ingresos.

Willian, sueña con poder procrear un hijo con su esposa y seguir trabajando la tierra para poder construir su propia casa en una zona más segura y en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
William is 36 years old. He went to school until the sixth grade. He stopped studying due to a lack of economic resources. He lives with his partner who is a housewife and cares for her mother-in-law.

William has worked in agriculture since his youth. He worked the land with his father. Now, in addition to agriculture, he works delivering parcels in a nearby city, which generates extra income. William currently has 14,000 square meters sown with corn. He sells the corn on the cob and keeps part of the harvest for his family's consumption. He has cultivated his own grains for 15 years.

The loan will be used to buy manure, fertilizers and gasoline for the pump with which he waters his crops, so that his harvests will produce more and his income will increase.

William dreams of having a son with his wife and of continuing to work the land in order to have his own house in a safer area and in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers and gasoline for the pump with which he waters his crops.

loans.name: Asotasi

texts.en:
Asotasi is a 45-year-old mother with two children. She owns and operates a small business of selling pancakes, pork cakes, and buns in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year.

Asotasi requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan to assist her in running the business. She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan.
